trans-unit.source: Defines the serialization context for WS-Trust messages.
A container for objects used to serialize WS-Trust requests (RST) and responses (RSTR).
trans-unit.target: WS-트러스트 요청 (RST) 및 (RSTR) 응답을 직렬화 하는 데 사용 되는 개체에 대 한 컨테이너입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class.

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지에서 발견된 토큰을 serialize하고 유효성을 검사하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> 개체 집합을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> 개체를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.

The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects to use for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지에서 발견된 토큰을 serialize하고 유효성을 검사하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> 개체 집합을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object to use to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지의 대부분의 요소에서 발견되는 보안 토큰 참조를 확인하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object to use to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: RST 메시지에서 발견되는 wst:RenewTarget 요소 및 RST 메시지의 wst:UseKey 요소에서 발견되는 보안 토큰 참조를 확인하는 데 사용할 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" />, and <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Protocols.WSTrust.WSTrustSerializationContext" />, <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> 및 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 개체를 사용하여 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 클래스의 새 인스턴스를 초기화합니다.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="securityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="securityTokenResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />.
-or-
<paramref name="useKeyTokenResolver" /> is <see langword="null" />.

Gets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> that contains the set of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects used for serializing and validating tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지에서 발견된 토큰을 serialize하고 유효성을 검사하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> 개체의 집합을 포함하는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" />를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollectionManager" /> object.
Gets or sets the collection of <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> objects used to serialize and validate security tokens found in WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지에서 발견된 보안 토큰을 serialize하고 유효성을 검사하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandler" /> 개체의 컬렉션을 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityTokenHandlerCollection" /> object.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object used to resolve security token references found in most elements of WS-Trust messages.
trans-unit.target: WS-Trust 메시지의 대부분의 요소에서 발견되는 보안 토큰 참조를 확인하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object.

Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object used to resolve security token references found in the wst:UseKey element of RST messages as well as the wst:RenewTarget element found in RST messages.
trans-unit.target: RST 메시지에서 발견되는 wst:RenewTarget 요소 및 RST 메시지의 wst:UseKey 요소에서 발견되는 보안 토큰 참조를 확인하는 데 사용되는 <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> 개체를 가져오거나 설정합니다.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenResolver" /> object.
